with ops.control_dependencies([values]):

body:
@drpngx, I had to put back this guard for both branches:

```
with ops.control_dependencies([values]):
  update_count_op = state_ops.assign_add(count, num_values)
```

This is because this operation doesn't seem to force evaluation of values:

```
math_ops.to_float(array_ops.size(values))
```

Thus, count get incremented while sum is unchanged due to OutOfRangeError.
